experience.organization: University of Washington - Department of Statistics
experience.description: Conducted advanced research on stochastic modeling and mortality rate projections. Utilized Bayesian inference techniques to improve the accuracy of life expectancy estimates in heterogeneous populations.

Assisted in the development of predictive models for property and casualty loss reserves. Performed sensitivity analysis on various discount rate scenarios and presented findings on long-tail liability trends to the senior actuarial team.
Analyzed historical climate data to model the impact of extreme weather events on regional agricultural insurance premiums using R and Python-based simulation tools.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
